scripts.build: npm run clean && node ./build.js && npm run copy
scripts.postpublish: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag core-support-v$PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags
scripts.copy: cp -r assets dist/ && cp tokens/grid/* dist/style/scss/ && npm run copy-files
